OpenStack Style Guide

  • Framework & Grid System
  • Color Palette
  • Typography
  • Form Elements
  • Navigation
  • Dialogs
  • Illustrations
  • Profile
  • Summit Specific Styles

Sidebars

  • Sidebars can be left or right.
  • Columns class/size should be col-lg-3 col-md-3 col-sm-3.
  • Margins should match element it's next to, ideally 40px 0.
  • Padding should be 30px.
  • $lightblue background.
  • Border-radius of 4px.

Example HTML 

<div class="col-lg-3 col-md-3 col-sm-3">
  <div class="sidebar">
    <ul>
	  <li><a href="#">Framework & Grid System</a></li>
	  <li><a href="#">Typography</a></li>
	  <li><a href="#">Form Elements</a></li>
	  <li><a href="#">Navigation</a></li>
	  <li><a href="#">Lists</a></li>
	  <li><a href="#">Videos</a></li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</div>
